com.i2group.apollo.common.tracing
Interface ITracerFactory

public interface ITracerFactory

A factory for creating tracer objects, which allow configuring and logging of any tracing information that an Intelligence Analysis Platform web service generates.

Method Summary
 ITracer getTracer(Class<?> classInst)
          Gets an ITracer for the specified Class.

Gets an ITracer for the specified Class.

See above.
